title: Did he read a child - convicted sex offender in the Houston public library?
subtitle: Many websites accurately mention the basic facts surrounding the conviction of Albert Alfonso Garza, who plays the role of "Tatiana Mala Niña."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Albert Alfonso Garza was convicted of sexual assault on a boy in 2006, before participating in "Drag Queen Story Time" in the Houston Public Library in 2017 and 2018.
